source.generate: SCHEMA: treatment(id, patient, hospital, npi, conf) physician(npi, name, spec, conf) medprescription(id, patient, npi, doctor, spec, conf) hospital(doctor, spec, npi, hospital) INSTANCE: treatment(id: "P1", patient: "A. Doe", hospital: "PPTH", npi: "1222", conf: "0.5") treatment(id: "P2", patient: "W. Smith", hospital: "PPTH", npi: "5555", conf: "0.5") physician(npi: "1222", name: "R. Chase", spec: "surg", conf: "0.5") physician(npi: "5555", name: "G. House", spec: "urol", conf: "0.5") medprescription(id: "P3", patient: "I. White", npi: "5556", doctor: "G. House", spec: "diag", conf: "0.7") medprescription(id: "P4", patient: "M. Ross", npi: "4321", doctor: "C. Taub", spec: "plast", conf: "0.7") hospital(doctor: "R. Chase", spec: "surg", npi: "1112", hospital: "PPTH")

target.generate: SCHEMA: prescription(id, patient, npiref, conf) doctor(npi, name, spec, hospital, conf) INSTANCE: prescription(id: "P1", patient: "J. Doe", npiref: "1112", conf: "0.5") doctor(npi: "1112", name: "R. Chase", spec: "surg", hospital: "Sacred H.", conf: "0.5") doctor(npi: "5555", name: "G. House", spec: "urol", hospital: "PPTH", conf: "0.7")

scenario.dependencies:
STTGDs: mst1: treatment(id: $id, patient: $patient, hospital: $hospital, npi: $npi, conf: $conf1), physician(npi: $npi, name: $name, spec: $spec, conf: $conf2) -> prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient, npiref: $npi, conf: $conf1), doctor(npi: $npi, name: $name, spec: $spec, hospital: $hospital, conf: $conf2).
mst2: medprescription(id: $id, patient: $patient, npi: $npi, doctor: $doctor, spec: $spec, conf: $conf) -> prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient, npiref: $npi, conf: $conf), doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor, spec: $spec, hospital: $H, conf: $conf).
ExtTGDs: mt1: prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient, npiref: $npi, conf: $conf) -> doctor(npi: $npi, name: $D, spec: $S, hospital: $H, conf: $C).
ExtEGDs: ep1a: prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient1, npiref: $npi1, conf: $conf1), prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient2, npiref: $npi2, conf: $conf2) -> $patient1 == $patient2.
ep1b: prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient1, npiref: $npi1, conf: $conf1), prescription(id: $id, patient: $patient2, npiref: $npi2, conf: $conf2) -> $npi1 == $npi2.
ed2a: doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor1, spec: $spec1, hospital: $hospital1, conf: $conf1), doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor2, spec: $spec2, hospital: $hospital2, conf: $conf2) -> $doctor1 == $doctor2.
ed2b: doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor1, spec: $spec1, hospital: $hospital1, conf: $conf1), doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor2, spec: $spec2, hospital: $hospital2, conf: $conf2) -> $spec1 == $spec2.
ed2c: doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor1, spec: $spec1, hospital: $hospital1, conf: $conf1), doctor(npi: $npi, name: $doctor2, spec: $spec2, hospital: $hospital2, conf: $conf2) -> $hospital1 == $hospital2.
ed3a: doctor(npi: $npi1, name: $doctor, spec: $spec1, hospital: $hospital1, conf: $conf1), doctor(npi: $npi2, name: $doctor, spec: $spec2, hospital: $hospital2, conf: $conf2) -> $npi1 == $npi2.
emd4a: hospital(doctor: $doctor, spec: $spec, npi: $npi1, hospital: $hospital1), doctor(npi: $npi2, name: $doctor, spec: $spec, hospital: $hospital2, conf: $conf2) -> $npi1 == $npi2.
emd4b: hospital(doctor: $doctor, spec: $spec, npi: $npi1, hospital: $hospital1), doctor(npi: $npi2, name: $doctor, spec: $spec, hospital: $hospital2, conf: $conf2) -> $hospital1 == $hospital2.
